conversation.content: Good afternoon. I need to close a commercial fleet account. The account holder, James Morrison, passed away last week.
I'm very sorry for your loss. I'll certainly help you with closing the account. May I have the fleet account number and your relationship to Mr. Morrison?
The account number is FLT-8847-JM. I've been driving for Morrison Funeral Services for twelve years.

Thank you. I see the Morrison Funeral Services fleet account with seven vehicles registered under license FLT-8847-JM. To proceed with the closure, I'll need to verify some information and understand the disposition of the vehicles.
I have power of attorney documents from the estate executor. All vehicles are being transferred to new ownership.

Excellent. I'll need you to submit those documents to our legal department at fleetservices@company.com, reference case number CLO-2847-MS. Are you authorized to handle the final billing and any outstanding maintenance contracts?
Yes, I'm handling all fleet-related matters. There should be three active maintenance contracts and current billing through this month.

Correct. I show three platinum maintenance contracts, numbers MC-7891-A through MC-7891-C, all paid through the 31st. The current billing cycle shows a balance of $4,247.85, which includes this month's lease payments and fuel card charges.
That sounds accurate. The estate will issue payment within ten business days. What's the process for the fuel cards?
Certainly.
And the GPS tracking units in each vehicle need to be deactivated as well.

I'll deactivate all seven GPS units effective midnight tonight, serial numbers GPS-5501 through GPS-5507. The fuel cards ending in 4421, 4422, and 4423 will be canceled simultaneously, and I'll email you the final fuel report.
Good. Will there be any early termination penalties on the lease agreements?

Due to the circumstances, I'm waiving all early termination fees, which would have totaled $8,750. I've added override code WV-3847-DEC to your account, and you'll receive written confirmation within 24 hours.
I appreciate that. The vehicles will be returned to your Riverside location by Friday.

Perfect. Please return them to our Riverside facility at 2847 Industrial Boulevard, open Monday through Friday 8 AM to 6 PM. Ensure each vehicle has at least a quarter tank of fuel and bring all sets of keys.
Everything will be in order. Can you send all final documentation to the estate attorney?
Of course.
That's Stephen Brennan at Brennan and Associates, 1500 Market Street, Suite 400.

I have that recorded as Stephen Brennan, Brennan and Associates, 1500 Market Street, Suite 400. All closure documentation, including form CLO-9982 and the final account statement, will be sent there within five business days. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
